morphInfos.tenseExplained: it has happened in the past
morphInfos.voiceExplained: it is something one does to oneself or for oneself
morphInfos.moodExplained: saying that an action should or must happen
morphInfos.functionDescription: an action should or must happen to or for
morphInfos.explanation: an action that should or must happen to or for people being spoken or written to
